title: SLvAUS: Sri Lanka call replacements to cover injuries
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The third and final T20 match between Sri Lanka and Australia will be played at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy today (11).
However, Sri Lanka’s Kasun Rajitha and Matheesha Pathirana have suffered injuries while training and will miss the third T20 against Australia today.
Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) stated that Asitha Fernando and Pramod Madushan have been called up as replacements of the two injured players.
Australia have already clinched the three-match T20I series by winning the first two games, and today’s match will begin at 7:00 PM.
